Text:
thanks for the share! works perfect with the THETA SSHD The second encounter fusion edition!!!!!!!!!!!

for anyone not sure where to put the files... put the two files that start with DLC in the content/SeriousSamHD_TSE folder.. that it.. time to play:)
the new level called The Grand Obelisk (in the DLC package) crashes on loading and it won't start...
